Package crew

Class Investor

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Observable
      • crew.CrewMember
        • crew.Investor
  • public class Investor
extends CrewMember
    the CrewMember subclass Investor provides a starting bonus to a CrewState's funds and the CrewState's Ship's max shield level.
